title: WiiM’s cheap wireless high-res audio streamer turns any speaker into a Sonos

title: Attackers can reveal identities of those using the largest NFT marketplace, research finds
description: A vulnerability in OpenSea allowed attackers to identify users, but the flaw was quickly fixed.

title: Sorry Microsoft: not even a full-page ad will make people want to use Edge
description: Microsoft is apparently forcing users to click through full-screen ads attempting to make you switch over to its Edge browser.

title: Managing business cloud costs is more challenging than ever
description: Companies are less concerned about security of their cloud infrastructure than they are about cutting costs and disaster recovery.

title: Healthcare and Finance are at serious risk with their cloud adoption
description: Data has moved from on-prem to cloud, but ownership and management haven’t migrated as well as we’d hoped.

title: ChatGPT is now being used to make scams much more dangerous

title: Apple’s mixed-reality headset has worrying echoes of the Apple Newton

title: YouTube videos made with AI are spreading malware

title: Etsy sellers aren't getting paid because of the Silicon Valley Bank collapse

title: Cloud provider Blackbaud pays the price for its ransomware cover-up
